official-title.#text:
To limit Department of Defense funds to support United States or Iraqi combat activities in or
			 around Iraq, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

header.#text:
Limitation on Department of Defense funds to support United States or Iraqi combat activities in or
			 around Iraq

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may be obligated or expended after
			 the date of the enactment of this Act to support, directly or indirectly,
			 any United States or Iraqi combat activities in or around Iraq.

text.#text: None of the funds made available to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may be made available until 90 days after the
			 date of the enactment of this Act to protect the safety and or evacuate
			 United States nationals, including military, diplomatic, and contractor
			 personnel.

term.#tail:
includes the use of United States military personnel or equipment in direct physical conflict, or
			 in combat supporting roles, including trainers or advisors.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
from arranging asylum or other
			 means of protection for Iraqi nationals who may be physically endangered
			 because of associations with the Government of the United States.

text.#text: Nothing in this section shall be construed to preclude the

header.#text: Rule of construction relating to asylum

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
from conducting such
			 intelligence activities as may be necessary to protect the interests of
			 the United States.

text.#text: Nothing in this section shall be construed to preclude the

header.#text: Rule of construction relating to intelligence activities

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
from providing humanitarian
			 assistance with respect to Iraq.

text.#text: Nothing in this section shall be construed to preclude the

header.#text: Rule of construction relating to humanitarian assistance

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 4912 IH: To limit Department of Defense funds to support United States or Iraqi combat activities in or around Iraq, and for other purposes.
